text: satyavisvasikalaya stri purusanmarkkya allahu talbhagattute ‎aruvikalealukunna svargiyaramannal vagdanam ceytirikkunnu. ‎avaravite sthiravasikalayirikkum. nityavasattinulla a ‎svargi yaramannalil avarkk sresthamaya parppi tannalunt; ‎sarveagapari allahuvinre niranna pritiyum. atetra mahattaram! ‎ujjvalamaya vijayavum atutanne. ‎
